00051 class uvm_barrier;
00052 typedef uvm_barrier *puvm_barrier;
00053 typedef uvm_callback_agent<puvm_barrier>   uvm_barrier_callback_agent;
00054 typedef uvm_callback_agent<puvm_barrier> *puvm_barrier_callback_agent;

00056 
00057 class uvm_barrier
00058 {
00059 public:
00060     uvm_barrier(const std::string & name="");
00061     virtual ~uvm_barrier();
00062 
00063     virtual const std::string & get_name() const { return _name; };
00064 
00065     virtual void wait(void);
00066     int get_num_barriers();
00067     void set_drain_time (sc_core::sc_time drain);
00068     sc_core::sc_time get_drain_time (void);
00069     virtual void raise_barrier(int count = 1);
00070     virtual void drop_barrier(int count = 1);
00071 
00072     puvm_barrier_callback_agent get_callback_agent(uvm_barrier_cb_type barrier_action);
00073 
00074 private:
00075     void wait_drain_time();
00076 
00077     int               _n_barriers;      // # of threads left to wait.
00078     std::string _name;
00079 
00080     sc_core::sc_time  _drain_time;
00081     sc_core::sc_event _barrier_event;   // Event to wait on.
00082     sc_core::sc_event _raise_event;
00083     sc_core::sc_event _drop_event;
00084 
00085     std::map<uvm_barrier_cb_type, puvm_barrier_callback_agent> _callback_map;
00086 };
